title: Killing the Kraken

properties.name: description
properties.value: The profit rate assumes 60 kills per hour. Your actual profits may be higher or lower depending on your speed and luck. You can get up to 90 kills per hour with maximum efficiency.

content:
Killing the Kraken boss.

  • 85+ , , recommended

    The profit rate assumes 60 kills per hour. Your actual profits may be higher or lower depending on your speed and luck. You can get up to 90 kills per hour with maximum efficiency.

    The Kraken can only be killed on a Slayer task.

    Strategies

    See the Kraken article and the strategy guide for additional information.

    The Kraken is a very relaxed boss to kill, dropping Kraken tentacles and Trident of the seas.

    The best Slayer master to get Kraken tasks from is Duradel who assigns tasks of 100-120 Cave krakens and is extendable. Players wishing to extend the task may use bracelets of slaughter, preferably by switching to it at the end of each kill to get the benefit from a Tormented bracelet for most of the kill.

    Due to constantly changing prices on the Grand Exchange, some information in this article may or may not be current.
    It is strongly recommended to check the live prices on the Grand Exchange before making large investments in any method.
    All prices on this page are cached, meaning it is possible that they appear out of date.
    To force a new cache of this page, click this link.
    If a money making method is out of date, you can edit it or leave a message on the talk page.
